name: cinebot
description: CineBot - AI Movie Companion powered by SignalWire and TMDB

TMDB_API_KEY.description: TMDB API key for movie/TV data

SWML_PROXY_URL_BASE.description: Public URL base for SWML callbacks (e.g., 'https://cinebot.example.com')

SWML_BASIC_AUTH_USER.description: Basic auth username for SWML endpoints (optional, auto-generated if not set)

SWML_BASIC_AUTH_PASSWORD.description: Basic auth password for SWML endpoints (optional, auto-generated if not set)

AGENT_NAME.description: Name for the SWML handler resource

POST_PROMPT_URL.description: Optional URL for post-prompt webhook to receive conversation summaries
